contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Kōzan'''|甲山町|Kōzan-chō}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Sera District, Hiroshima|Sera District]], [[Hiroshima Prefecture|Hiroshima]], [[Japan]]. On October 1, 2004 Kōzan, along with the town of [[Seranishi, Hiroshima|Seranishi]], also from [[Sera District, Hiroshima|Sera District]], was merged into the expanded town of [[Sera, Hiroshima|Sera]] and no longer exists as an independent [[municipality of Japan|municipality]]. As of 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 6,732 and a [[population density|density]] of 67.46 persons per km². The total area was 99.79 km². ==External links== * [http://www.town.sera.hiroshima.jp/ Official website of Sera] {{ja icon}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kozan, Hiroshima}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Hiroshima Prefecture]] {{Hiroshima-geo-stub}}
